1627714415913516768.Text: Habasi hears you broke our agreement. Habasi does not want to speak with you now.

3230111137262605603.Text: It was quite a journey, wasn't it?

1566418242350324181.Text: Very well, then. I will wait here for now.

1985028150171727364.Text: Very well, %PCName. Now you and I will travel together. When we have arrived in the ashkhan's yurt at Zainab camp, we will speak further about my new bridegroom.

13254119051640113484.Text: Are you ready now for me to accompany you to Zainab camp?
Script: Choice, "Yes, please accompany me to Zainab camp." 5, "No, you should wait here for now." 6

35796573207898805.Text: Very well, then. I will wait here for now.

2382831711380321030.Text: Very well, %PCName. Now you and I will travel together. When we have arrived in the ashkhan's yurt at Zainab camp, we will speak further about my new bridegroom.

3226218431914823096.Text: We travel together to Zainab camp. When we arrive there, we will speak further about my new bridegroom. Do you wish me to continue accompanying you?
Script: Choice, "Yes, please continue with me to Zainab camp." 3, "No, you should wait here for now." 4

6609142221955829827.Text: Very well, %PCName. Now you and I will travel together. When we have arrived in the ashkhan's yurt at Zainab camp, we will speak further about my new bridegroom.

354021163010821605.Text: Very well, then. I will wait here for now. When you are ready, come to me, and I will travel together with you to Zainab camp to meet my new bridegroom.

1536914300137817921.Text: But, first, didn't you have some presents for me?

2691292701868521581.Text: Are we ready to travel together to Zainab camp? Do not worry if we must cross water, for I am an excellent swimmer. But take care to protect me from wild beasts and bandits, for I have not learned any of the arts of war. I do know a few spells, but they the spells of a household slave, and will probably be of little use if we are in danger. So. Shall we go now?
Script: Choice, "Yes, please accompany me to Zainab camp." 1, "No, you should wait here for now." 2

27780318791387024597.Text: Perhaps some day, yes. For example, I would greatly wish to see the Ashlands and their peoples with my own eyes. But at present, my duties to the Morag Tong do not permit me to travel.

1183240911993821101.Text: Very well, then. I will wait here for now.

11390266152058014181.Text: Thank you, %PCName. I will follow you to Jobasha's Rare Books, and we will speak further there.

23461218033190417363.Text: Thank you, %PCName. I will follow you to Jobasha's Rare Books, and we will speak further there.

2010323127278002946.Text: Will you travel together with me to Jobasha's Rare Books? We leave the door to the Foreign Quarter Waistworks, turn right, west, continue down the hall and across the atrium on the same level, then follow the opposite corridor west on the other side of the atrium all the way to Jobasha's door.
Script: Choice, "Yes, please follow me to Jobasha's Rare Books.", 1, "No, you should wait here for now.", 2

178631673225958934.Text: Will you travel together with me to Jobasha's Rare Books? We leave the door to the Foreign Quarter Waistworks, turn right, west, continue down the hall and across the atrium on the same level, then follow the opposite corridor west on the other side of the atrium all the way to Jobasha's door. I must warn you: unless these troublesome fools are persuaded to behave like civilized beings, there may be fighting and killing if we try to travel together.
Script: Choice, "Yes, please follow me to Jobasha's Rare Books.", 1, "No, you should wait here for now.", 2

3323316951368928779.Text: I have no interest in seeing the rest of Vvardenfell, but I appreciate your offer.

12984269792024714940.Text: Lead the way to the Halfway Tavern in Pelagiad, %PCName.

3148917781602626876.Text: I will wait for you here.

1439323809325864819.Text: Do you want me to wait here?

3064612252858131527.Text: Do you want me to follow you?

29503274223246327451.Text: Now I can return to Summerset Isle. I've had enough of these Telvanni.

1623231102222405384.Text: Thank you for taking me to the Elf-Skerring. I was keeping these scrolls just in case something unfortunate happened. Since I have arrived safely, I feel you deserve them.

74518841203442282.Text: Very well. Take me to the Elf-Skerring at the Telvanni docks, %PCName.

25012416194811829.Text: I will wait for you here. Please hurry, %PCName. I do not feel safe here in Sadrith Mora.

9107208102074010578.Text: Do you want me to wait here?

1651129701143646435.Text: Do you want me to follow you?

183023550110328347.Text: Thank you for helping me in my pilgrimage to the Koal Cave. I will stay here awhile and travel back to Ald'ruhn with another pilgrim.

8439249722771914374.Text: Take me to the Koal Cave, %PCName.

1348515950573018551.Text: Whatever you say. I will wait here.

4093251013160023960.Text: Do you want me to wait here?

23911266152119914918.Text: Do you want me to follow you to the Koal Cave?

3035517853861815618.Text: Sorry, but I must stay here in Sarethi Manor until I am feeling better.

2042024395235434948.Text: Take me to my father in Sarethi Manor.

3225931509322028529.Text: Do you want me to wait here?

31126280372782626968.Text: Shall we travel back to my father, Athyn Sarethi?

18972989517597347.Text: Thank you for guiding me back to Novor Drethan.

6691265682082915941.Text: Guide me back to Novor Drethan so he knows I'm safe.

285625330315418394.Text: I will wait for you here.

20471149702765414293.Text: Do you want me to wait here?

303056792971023918.Text: Are you ready to guide me back to Novor Drethan?

6456284481728923111.Text: Thank you, %PCName, but I can make my own way from here.

3186080982378213358.Text: I will wait here until you think it is safe.

317879906115849179.Text: Do you want me to wait here?

9087203292266728231.Text: Can you guide me back outside?

9509103641617322860.Text: Not right now, I need to sell my goods here in Pelagiad. Thanks to you, everyone will know the name Tarvyn Faren as a trader who can reach his customers even with all the troubles for House Hlaalu.

2686832383110910524.Text: Take me to the Halfway Tavern in Pelagiad.

219122411367810847.Text: Do you want me to wait here?

9012220871253825033.Text: Should I keep following you to the Halfway Tavern in Pelagiad?

3715320742321919715.Text: I will not leave unless the Telvanni necromancer is dead. Find Milyn Faram and kill him before he does something terrible.

2043112900154498985.Text: No, but thank you. I must stay here to help secure Odirniran.

2984768891227327165.Text: Take me to my sister, Remasa Othril.

23233264252354326619.Text: Whatever you say. I will stay here until it's safe.

238811564256368047.Text: Do you want me to wait here?

23300242451191923190.Text: Shall we travel together to Remasa Othril? She must still be here in Odirniran.

114010849325979619.Text: Not right now, I have alot of work to do here. But thanks for getting me out of that tomb.

1098584716415213.Text: Take me to the Maar Gan shrine.

7552258662719223130.Text: Do you want me to wait here?

362019832423011140.Text: Can we travel together to Maar Gan?

1296970001038322361.Text: I can find my own way back to Gnaar Mok. It's not a long swim once I've had a chance to rest a bit.

18867793580671089.Text: Okay. I'll stay right here until you come and get me.

272392803327388159.Text: Do you want me to wait here?

20630731799031343.Text: Do you want me to follow you back outside this cave?

329142301511915266.Text: No, but thank you. I will rest here and continue my pilgrimage when I can.

91475302620620366.Text: Lead me to the Ald Velothi Outpost.

478057122101314892.Text: Lead me to the Ald Velothi Outpost.

31048145453256523695.Text: Okay. I'll stay right here until you come and get me.

8358278053261011575.Text: Do you want me to wait here?

18988219601446514284.Text: Do you want me to follow you?

5140669844524802.Text: Do you want me to follow you?

18759323652624525743.Text: Do you want me to follow you? Abassel will try and kill me if I leave.

252421912230514163.Text: I'm staying here until Frald the White says it's safe.

11773104651570218359.Text: I'll follow you to Frald the White. Try and avoid the guards.

243218961920130935.Text: I'll stay here until you think it's safe.

10220982869522556.Text: Do you want me to wait here?

105082617822640163.Text: Do you want me to follow you back to Ebonheart?

1258920092236577165.Text: Perhaps, but not today. I must travel with Sterdecan until he passes me on to another. If all goes well, I will see my homeland again.

3250722142527710766.Text: I will follow you. I must get to Sterdecan's Farm.

16891238512691666.Text: I will stay here until you tell me it is safe to go on.

682614364110283712.Text: Do you want me to wait here?

14794179231106114941.Text: Should I continue to follow you to the Fields of Kummu?
Script: Choice "No, wait here." 1 "Yes, let's keep going." 2

63751901886132503.Text: I'll wait here for you. But hurry!

133827980219148669.Text: Yes, I must find my beloved Sason.
Script: Choice "Wait here. I'll return for you." 1 "Let's get moving." 2

2660818383257230121.Text: Please, we've got to get to that place. Please hurry.

2574524558130411159.Text: Yes, powerful one. I, the poor slave, will wait here for you.

13347299732378215248.Text: Shall we continue on? I must get to freedom.
Script: Choice "No. Wait here." 1 "Yes, let's get moving." 2

7546294012327227086.Text: Excellent. Let's be on our way.

178312907675010500.Text: If you think it's wise. I'll wait here for you.

Script: Choice "You should wait here." 1 "Yes, let's go." 2
Choice "You should wait here." 1 "Yes, let's go." 2

254096044339517071.Text: Thank you, %PCName. I have duties I must attend to, and then I must find a way to reach my father. Until then, please deliver my locket to my father, Arethan Mandas.

1167022926628917554.Text: Very well. We will try and escape. Take me outside this tower, %PCName.

9598138081850730297.Text: I will wait for you here.

5256231592833727221.Text: Do you want me to wait here?
Script: Choice "No, keep folllowing me." 1 "Yes, wait here." 2

83678322445122562.Text: Thank you for rescuing me. I will take a ship back to Ald'ruhn. I am sure my father, Miner Arobar, will reward you.

7564184892099431787.Text: Take me to the Telvanni docks, %PCName. Once I'm near a ship out of here, I'll feel alot safer.

16721250622073629515.Text: I shall wait for you here.

2004991511984523450.Text: We must get to the Telvanni docks. Only then will I feel safe.

23359297413114422156.Text: Yes, get me out of here. My father, Miner Arobar, will reward you.

18048274422048718606.Text: %Name follows %PCName. Watch out for the slavehunters.

2207218177182389231.Text: Are there slavehunters near? Should %Name wait?
Script: Choice "No, keep following me." 1 "Yes, wait here a moment." 2

1047323760231364115.Text: If slavehunters are there, they see %Name and kill %Name. You sure you want %Name to follow %PCName?

59272914791898546.Text: I am here at the Mabrigash camp. We have no reason to travel together.

155892467090174998.Text: I shall follow you to the Mabrigash camp.

3028275243231930558.Text: I will wait here. But do not test my patience.

1231114153109727918.Text: Yes, we travel to the Mabrigash camp.

10200169763196329114.Text: Really? Excellent! I mean...I wouldn't want to get in the way. You understand. I'll guard your back from here.

18372162080003293.Text: Oh...if you insist. I mean, if you're completely sure....

2091021750732311715.Text: Do you want me to stay with you? I'd be willing to wait here. I m-mean, it's up to you.

851395041425131174.Text: Not a bright choice, if you ask me.

2702731522608629266.Text: You want that we keep going together? Probably a good idea.

26239323941534219976.Text: It is best if I remain here.

311882790128006716.Text: We should continue to travel together, should we not?

17887102541567525512.Text: I am already safe and sound here at the shrine, %PCClass, but thank you for your concern.

1269411373317084.Text: Let's go, %PCName!  You lead on, and I'll follow you back to the Imperial Cult Shrine at Fort Frostmoth!

16110247942360124941.Text: All right, %PCName.  I'll wait right here.

101781612376816312.Text: Do you want me to wait here, %PCName?

6045309411483418683.Text: Will you escort me back to the Imperial Cult Shrine at Fort Frostmoth?
